Workflow Steps

1
Direct Avica Setup
Download Avica installer and setup files from GitLab repository
Downloading: setup.py, Avica_setup.exe, show.bat, loop.bat
2
Install Dependencies
Install Python packages and enable RDP services
pip install requests pyautogui telegraph
3
Configure RDP Access
Enable Remote Desktop and configure firewall rules
Enable-NetFirewallRule -DisplayGroup "Remote Desktop"
4
Setup System User
Configure runneradmin user with password
net user runneradmin TheDisa1a
5
Start Avica Service
Launch Avica application and generate connection credentials
Start-Process "Avica_setup.exe"
6
Keep Session Active
Maintain connection and display GoFile link with credentials
cmd /c loop.bat
